definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: After inoculation with P. yoelii, parasites disappeared naturally, but with P. berghei…
sentences.chinese: 但接种伯氏疟原虫后的阳性小鼠则不能自然转阴。

sentences.english: P. vivax has been neglected because it is rarely fatal.
sentences.chinese: 间日疟原虫被人们忽略，这是由于它很少导致死亡。

sentences.english: has been neglected because it is rarely fatal.
sentences.chinese: 间日疟原虫被人们忽略，这是由于它很少导致死亡。

sentences.english: A static cultivation apparatus for the culture in vitro of Plasmodium falciparum gametocytes is described.
sentences.chinese: 应用自制恒温恒气装置静态培养恶性疟原虫配子体。

sentences.english: Many of these targeted places on the malarial parasite different from the places targeted by current drugs.
sentences.chinese: 其中许多化合物瞄准了不同于目前药物的疟原虫部位。

sentences.english: Objective To induce a line of Plasmodium berghei with resistance to artemisinin.
sentences.chinese: 目的培育伯氏疟原虫青蒿素抗性系。

sentences.english: The life cycle of Plasmodium parasites is known to depend on temperature.
sentences.chinese: 已知疟原虫的生命史依赖于温度。

sentences.english: Now, the Duffy blood-group protein is essentially necessary for Plasmodium vivax to get into the red cell.
sentences.chinese: 现在间日疟原虫必须依靠达菲蛋白进入红细胞。

sentences.english: The research of proteomics is one of the important studies on Plasmodium .
sentences.chinese: 蛋白组学研究是疟原虫研究中的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Only the drug derived from Artemisia annua appears to be effective against all strains of the malaria parasite.
sentences.chinese: 只有从青蒿中提取的药物对所有类型的疟原虫都有效。

sentences.english: The evolution of drug-resistant Plasmodium strains, especially those resistant to chloroquine, has had major impacts on global public health.
sentences.chinese: 抗药性疟原虫的发生已经严重影响到全球健康。

sentences.english: When malign plasmodium parasitism, film of red blood cell has the drawback with irregular height.
sentences.chinese: 恶性疟原虫寄生时，红细胞膜有高度不规则的缺陷。

sentences.english: Multidrug-resistant Plasmodium falciparum malaria is also widely prevalent in south-east Asia and South America.
sentences.chinese: 耐多药恶性疟原虫疟疾在东南亚和南美洲也广泛流行。

sentences.english: Malaria parasites reside in bubbles, called vacuoles, inside infected cells.
sentences.chinese: 疟原虫位于感染细胞的空泡中，这些空泡被称作液泡。

sentences.english: ABSTEACT. AIM To study the infectivity of different densities of P. vivax to An. sinensis.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察不同密度间日疟原虫对中华按蚊的感染性。

sentences.english: However, the infected mice challenged with the heterologous strain of plasmodia were died completely.
sentences.chinese: 而异种疟原虫攻击时小鼠全部感染并死亡。

definition: gonococcus/Neisseria gonorrhoeae, the pathogen causing gonorrhea
